name: Crocs Classic Clogs - Unisex
description: These sporty clogs are legendary for their versatility. Lightweight and super-comfy, Crocs are great for beaches, pools and daily summer wear. The heel strap can be rotated out of the way to convert them to slip-ons.Made of light, durable closed-cell resin.Water-friendly and buoyant, with venting ports to drain water.Contoured footbed for comfort and support.Pivoting heel strap provides a secure fit.Non-marking soles.Roomy, wide fit.
